item.source: Can some 1 help me fix dark bow attack on my server?

item.title: Can some 1 help me fix dark bow attack on my server?
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

Here you go.

Search for:

[code]ase 73: //Attack (Wilderness)

                            if(PkingDelay <= 1)[/code]

And within the code below should look something like this:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)

Add this:

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == YOUR DARKBOW ID

Dont add it at the end at it in the middle.

Then search for:

 else if(!nonWild() && !AttackingOn2.nonWild()){

And do the same thing add this in the middle not at the end:

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == YOUR DARKBOW ITEM ID

Now search for:

staticAnimation(25, absX, absY, 100);	//Crystal bow with arrows made by dell

And do the same thing add this in the middle not at the end:

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == YOUR DARKBOW ID ||

Now search for:

f (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true

And do the same thing add this in the middle not at the end:

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == YOUR DARKBOW ID

And it should work, this wont make it not hit really fast but should make it hit like a normal bow.

Read full topic
